General.Name: Your Family Entertainment AG
General.Description: Your Family Entertainment AG operates as a producer and license distributor of family and children entertainment programs worldwide. The company owns and operates independent programs libraries; and owns extensive rights to comic characters, which includes Fix&Foxi universe, Moorhuhn (Crazy Chicken), Enid Blyton, Happily Never After, and Odd Parents; and popular series Urmel and Altair. It also operates pay-TV channel under the Fix&Foxi name; free-to-air channel under the RiC TV name; and various mobile TV streams and digital channels. The company is headquartered in Munich, Germany. Your Family Entertainment AG operates as a subsidiary of Genius Brands International, Inc.
